text: How can we integrate HubSpot Conversations chat sdk in Angular?
Hi, is there anyone who knows how to add blog post to a custom coded email template?

Not sure about the Salesforce side, you if you mean without a paid HubSpot portal, you could get a dev sandbox:
<https://offers.HubSpot.com/free-cms-developer-sandbox>
I would like to have two-way binding between the HubSpot and Salesforce. Is it possible on the free version? It is required for testing purposes.

This Slack lives and breathes by its community. If you're posting a question, take a moment and click around a few channels to see if there are any questions you can help answer. Instant karma!

I am trying to determine the internal values(Association type ID values) for association labels on my custom object  such as the ones found on the standard APIv4 documentation,  any advice? <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/associations#endpoint?spec=POST-/crm/v3/associations/{fromObjectType}/{toObjectType}/batch/create>
Maybe I'm just blind, but how can I change the published date of a blog article using the new editor interface?
Ahh figured it out, it wasn't clear that you can set a date in the past AS WELL as the future with the publishing options:

Does anyone know a way to get the specific url of a variation A of a A/B test? could be with a param or a specific slug

I want to create a A/B test campaign where the A variation of a email is tied to the A variation a landing page and B variation of the email is tied to the B variation of the landing page. So to summarize:

Email A->Page A
Email B->Page B

I can get  the specific slug of the B variation with the CMS API endpoint GET*`/cms/v3/pages/landing-pages/{objectId}`*

```  "slug": "-ab-variant-c7b8db6a-aa3c-40d1-9a2c-8fac17be28b8",
  "url": "<https://mydomain.com/my-slug>",```

But since the slug of the A variation is the same as the URL it is not unique to this variation.

```  "slug": "my-slug",
  "url": "<https://mydomain.com/my-slug>",```
I can't run an A/B test at the email level that leads to top level url of my page because there is a chance the variations get mixed:

Email A->Page B
Email B->Page A

I know I could simply create 2 distinct email and 2 distinct pages but I wanted to know if there would be a way to use the native A/B test functionality
The free developer sandbox is NOT the same as a the free level CMS Hub. It has full capabilities to test from, features that you have access to in paid CMS portals.

You’d use the following - GET*`/crm/v4/associations/{fromObjectType}/{toObjectType}/labels`*

It’s in the association schema endpoints tab of the link in your message.

I'm a newcomer to this topic and currently working on integrating n8n with HubSpot. My goal is to set up an event trigger that will be activated whenever a ticket is closed. I'm seeking guidance on the best approach to achieve this integration. Thank you for your assistance.
